filmography.title: Night After Night
filmography.role_description: A wisecracking ex-girlfriend of a speakeasy owner who steals every scene in West's film debut; famous for the line 'Goodness had nothing to do with it.'
filmography.plot: An ex-boxer buys a high-class speakeasy to improve his social standing but finds his past catching up with him.

filmography.title: She Done Him Wrong
filmography.role_description: A seductive saloon singer in the Bowery who collects diamonds and men, famously inviting Cary Grant to 'come up sometime.'
filmography.plot: A seductive nightclub singer contends with several suitors, including a jealous escaped convict and a handsome young temperance league member.

filmography.title: I'm No Angel
filmography.role_description: A circus lion tamer and performer who climbs the social ladder by suing wealthy men for breach of promise.
filmography.plot: A circus performer finds romance with a wealthy man, but his cousin tries to break up the relationship.

filmography.title: Belle of the Nineties
filmography.role_description: A burlesque queen who moves from St. Louis to New Orleans, catching the eye of a boxing champ and a jewel thief.
filmography.plot: A burlesque performer travels to New Orleans and gets mixed up with a prizefighter and a crook.

filmography.title: Goin' to Town
filmography.role_description: A wealthy dance hall queen who tries to break into high society to win the heart of a British aristocrat.
filmography.plot: A dance hall queen inherits a fortune and tries to marry into high society, facing snobbery along the way.

filmography.title: Klondike Annie
filmography.role_description: A woman who kills her keeper in self-defense and flees to the Yukon disguised as a missionary.
filmography.plot: A woman wanted for murder escapes to the Klondike by posing as a Salvation Army worker.

filmography.title: Go West Young Man
filmography.role_description: A pampered movie star who gets stranded in the country and sets her sights on a handsome, rustic farmhand.
filmography.plot: A movie star is stranded at a country boarding house and flirts with a local mechanic to make her boyfriend jealous.

filmography.title: Every Day's a Holiday
filmography.role_description: A con artist in 1890s New York who tries to clean up the city's police force to get back at a corrupt captain.
filmography.plot: A con woman returns to New York to help an honest police captain run for mayor against a corrupt administration.

filmography.title: My Little Chickadee
filmography.role_description: A woman with a reputation who enters a sham marriage with a con man, played by W.C. Fields, to gain respectability in the West.
filmography.plot: A woman is run out of town and teams up with a con man on a train, entering into a fake marriage to gain respect.

filmography.title: The Heat's On
filmography.role_description: A temperamental Broadway star who gets involved in a scheme to produce a new show.
filmography.plot: A Broadway star helps a producer put on a show despite the interference of a censorship organization.

filmography.title: Myra Breckinridge
filmography.role_description: A powerful, man-hungry talent agent who auditions young men in Hollywood; West's return to film after 27 years.
filmography.plot: A man undergoes a sex-change operation and goes to Hollywood to claim his inheritance and wreak havoc.

filmography.title: Sextette
filmography.role_description: A glamorous movie star whose honeymoon with her sixth husband is interrupted by her previous husbands; West's final film at age 84.
filmography.plot: A movie star's honeymoon is disrupted by the arrival of her five ex-husbands and an international conference.
